I’m Xuefei Li, pursuing Ph.D. in Electrical, Computer, and System Engineering at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute. I am fortunate to be advised by Prof. Tianyi Chen.

My Background is in the area of Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning. I also have some experience in Computer Vision and Visualization, see [Gallery].

My current research interest focuses on the theory and applications of Reinforcement Learning and Optimization.
